shortdesc.ph: Reports the statistics of the local video stream.

pd.p: Video transmission bitrate (Kbps), represented by an instantaneous value.Does not include the bitrate of the retransmission videos.

plentry.pd: Actual sending frame rate (Kbps).Does not include the frame rate of the retransmission videos.
The encoder output frame rate (fps) of the local video.
The render output frame rate (fps) of the local video.
The target bitrate (Kbps) of the current encoder. This value is estimated by the SDK based on the current network conditions.
The target frame rate (fps) of the current encoder.
Quality change of the local video in terms of target frame rate and target bit rate in this reported interval. See .

pd.p: Video receive bitrate (Kbps), represented by an instantaneous value.Does not include the bitrate of the retransmission videos.

plentry.pd: The width of the encoding frame (px).
The height of the encoding frame (px).
The value of the sent frames, represented by an aggregate value.

plentry.pt: CodecType: Encoding type of the sent audio.
plentry.pd: The codec type of the local video.
The video packet loss rate (%) from the local client to the Agora edge server before applying the anti-packet loss strategies.

plentry.pt: CaptureFrameRate: Frame rate of the captured video, in fps.
plentry.pd: The capture frame rate (fps) of the local video.

pd.p: The brightness level of the video image captured by the local camera. See .
